name: Andreas VII
description:
Andreas VII is a puzzle centered talking-sim, complete tasks, converse with ground control and lose your sense of self as you travel further in space than any who have come before you.

How known are you willing to be to know, how much are you prepared to give up?

If you return to the Almighty, 

you will be restored.

cw for themes of Christianity and horror

Credits: 

Writing and art: https://twitter.com/deitydogs

Code and music: https://twitter.com/unseconds

(all the other stuff was a mix of us) 

also this game uses this shader: https://trixelized.itch.io/gbshader

and the font pixellari in places: https://www.dafont.com/pixellari.font
